value:
So your world has a festival that
celebrates love too, huh?$k$pWhat kind of people would win your
world's tournament?

You're wasting your time if you came
to me for gift-giving advice.$k$pWhat I have to share on that matter
could hardly be classified as "advice."

I don't know if it's because of the
festival or what, but... Does everyone
seem a bit rowdy to you?

There's a whole row of stalls in town
selling all sorts of treats. And they all
look mighty sweet to me.$k$pBut the only treat I need is a good
tournament!

Eliwood and I used to spar all the
time. He's not as sturdy as I am, but
he still gave me a run for my money!

I've got a gift for you, from
$Nf. But if you
don't want it... I'll take it.

Victory at the tournament will
be mine!

Can't lose focus just because it's
festival time.

Maybe I'm getting a little ahead
of myself here...

Guess I need to return the favor.
So, uh... What do you want?

I'm Hector. Huh? You didn't summon
me here hoping for a gift, did you?

Gift giving isn't really my thing, but I
know a good gift can show someone
how grateful you are to them.$k$pSo I guess that means I should hand
some out... I'll get something for my
daughter Lilina, and for Eliwood.$k$pBut I never know what to say when I
hand over a gift. It's always just kind
of...embarrassing...$k$pSay, $Nu...
Why don't you help me come up with
something? I'm really hopeless here.$k$pYou'll do it? Great! I owe you big time!
Heh, guess that means I'll have to get
something for you, too.
おおっ！
Take this!
うああっ！
What?!
Got a present for you!
Take this!
My arm is singin'!
I ain't sweet!
Took 'em too lightly...
ははっ！
The name's Hector. Now, where's this tournament I heard about?
Whoa! Hey, what's with you? Don't sneak up on a guy like that!
So, is Eliwood around? I can't relax until we spar.
Just so we're clear... I will not, under any circumstances, allow my daughter to get married! She's not gonna be anybody's bride.
What would I like? Well, I guess… Maybe a bite to eat. Or a good weapon!
Never thought I'd see the day my daughter was giving me presents...
I've never been great at picking out gifts, but I promise I'll keep you safe.
Nice.
What do you want?
You'll make the right choice.
